nodes.bodyText: Thanks for the reminding. I've updated to resolve this concurrency issue.
nit: can we call this maxRetryCountOnUpdateFailure ?
Can we add time unit into the name? Like retryDelaySeconds or retryDelayMs ?
logger.error("Failed to mark containers INACTIVE in set : {}  after {} retries", inactiveContainerCandidateSet, config.retryCount);
Also I am considering if we need a metric here for alerting purpose.
